basic_info.description:
ðŸ‘‹ My name is Khristian, Iâ€™m a full-stack software developer, and I use JavaScript, React-Redux, and Ruby on Rails to create attractive and efficient web platforms as business solutions for all kinds of enterprises.

My career began as a translator and language teacher, I spent every day working with a variety of people from different cultures as I developed strong communication skills, also teaching them how to associate concepts from one language to another and the logic behind it.

Looking for better and didactic ways of teaching my students, I encountered myself interested in solving problems through code, an industry where the abilities to learn, teach, relate well to people, and high work ethics are of much value.

Recently I enrolled in Microverse, a remote software development school, where I practiced pair-programming in over 40 different projects, from UX design to APIs, with remote developers from all around the world.

projects.title: Thoughts Social Media
projects.description: Social media app called thoughts as a Twitter redesign, authentication with devise

projects.title: RPG Game
projects.description: RPG Game developed with Phaser3, ES6, and Webpack. The player fights monsters to score up and avoid being killed.

projects.title: INTERACTIVE LEARNING
projects.description: JS app to allow teachers to automate their student's learning process with questions, options to answer, animations, and hints on their answers.
